title: Diverse Training Data for Complex NLP Tasks
summary: Expands the training dataset to include a wider range of complex natural language processing tasks.

title: Enhanced Entity Linking for Contextual Accuracy
summary: Improves entity linking by refining model parameters and expanding the training dataset for better contextual understanding.

title: Enhanced Entity Recognition with Hybrid Models
summary: Integrates a hybrid model approach to improve entity recognition by combining rule-based and machine learning techniques.

title: Contextual Drift in Long Queries
summary: NLP model returns partially relevant results for long text inputs, affecting search accuracy.

title: Incorrect Negation Handling in NLP Pipeline
summary: Negation terms are not correctly processed, leading to inaccurate sentiment analysis results.
